des:
The Domus One skill lets you control your compatible Wi-Fi thermostats with your voice.

To make the most out of this skill you have to own a compatible Wi-Fi thermostat, and you have to to link it to your Domus One account. The procedure to linking the thermostat is the following:
- turn on the thermostat and make sure its Wi-Fi is on (refer to the thermostat manual)
- download from your smartphone store (Google Play or App Store) the "Domus One" app and launch it
- create an account (if you haven't already)
- Tap [+ Add New Thermostat]
- Follow the on-screen instructions carefully, step by step
- Connect the thermostat to your home Wi-Fi network
- Tap on [+ Add New Thermostat] and select "Yes" to link the thermostat to your account through the thermostat QR code
- Give the thermostat a name and place it in a group and it will appear in your list of devices

From the Alexa app activate the Domus One skill and login to your Domus One account. Once logged in Alexa will search for the linked devices and will find your thermostats.
